cells.data: To create the windows in user preferences enable the Windows Generator plug in:

When setting up the window, make sure not to do anything else (like rotating window), as this will cause all the settings to disappear.
The materials are there, but not set up correctly (The glass texture is not transparent for instance):

Need to add glass shader mixed with transparent shader, then use light path shadow to mix two inputs that in turn control the factor of the two glass shaders, while still maintaining reflections.
